
    [tw2.widgets]
    widgets = tw2.core

    [paste.app_factory]
    dev_server = tw2.core.middleware:make_app

    [paste.filter_app_factory]
    middleware = tw2.core.middleware:make_middleware
     # Is this broken for py3?
    [distutils.commands]
    archive_tw2_resources = tw2.core.command:archive_tw2_resources
